'''Deflection!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to use a [[shield]] to counter a [[Primo Geovishap]]'s Primordial Shower attack.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The shield cannot be Geo or a matching type to [[Primo Geovishap]]'s element.
